trans-unit.source: Please enter the image size name.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo vnesite ime za velikost slike.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Tukaj lahko vnesete širino v pikslih.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the height in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Tukaj lahko vnesete višino v pikslih.

trans-unit.source: Only applicable if width and height are specified.
trans-unit.target: Uporabljeno le, če sta širina in višina določena.

trans-unit.source: 0 = the whole image is visible, 100 = only the important part of the image is visible.
trans-unit.target: 0 = celotna slika vidna, 100 = le pomemben del slike je viden.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the intended layout width of the image, the actual size should be defined via CSS. Example: (max-width: 600px) 100vw, 50vw.
Here you can define the pixel densities (e.g. 1x, 1.5x, 2x) or width descriptors (e.g. 100w, 200w).
The CSS classes will be added to the image tag.
trans-unit.target: Razredi CSS bodo dodani k slikovnemu elementu - image tag.

trans-unit.source: Here you can select which image formats shall be converted.
trans-unit.target: Tu lahko nastavite, kateri formati slik bodo pretvorjeni.

trans-unit.source: The following formats are not supported on your server: %s
trans-unit.target: Naslednji formati datotek niso podprti na vašem strežniku: %s

trans-unit.source: Preserve copyright-related metadata fields (EXIF, IPTC, XMP).
Please select the metadata fields to preserve.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, izberite polja metapodatkov, ki naj se obdržijo

trans-unit.source: Use original image if dimensions match
trans-unit.target: Uporabi originalno sliko, če ste velikost ujema

trans-unit.source: Note that no optimizations such as metadata stripping or JPEG compression will be applied in this case.
trans-unit.target: Upoštevajte, da v tem primeru ne bo izvedena nobena optimizacija kot npr. odstranjevanje meta podatkov ali stiskanje JPEG.

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the image compression quality between 0 (lowest quality) and 100 (highest quality). Leave blank to use the system default.
Defer loading the image until it is scrolled into the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Sliko naloži šele takrat, ko je vidna na zaslonu.

trans-unit.source: Date and time of the latest revision
The longer side of the image is adjusted to the given dimensions and the image is resized proportionally.
trans-unit.target: Daljša stranica slike se prilagodi na podane dimenzije in slika spremeni velikost proporcionalno.

trans-unit.source: The shorter side of the image is adjusted to the given dimensions and the image is resized proportionally.
trans-unit.target: Krajša stranica se prilagodi na podane dimenzije in slika spremeni velikost proporcionalno.

trans-unit.source: The image will be resized to the given dimensions. If necessary, it will be cropped.
trans-unit.target: Slika bo spremenjena po danih dimenzijah. Če je potrebno, bo obrezana.
Izberi poljubna polja z meta podatki
Odstrani vsa polja z meta podatki

trans-unit.source: Show the details of image size ID %s
trans-unit.target: Prikaži podrobnosti o velikosti slike ID %s

trans-unit.source: Edit the media queries of image size ID %s
